text: Ben Price (born 30 June 1972) is an English actor, television presenter and writer for YouTube, best known for his portrayal of Nick Tilsey in ITV's longest running television soap opera Coronation Street, a role which he has played since 2009. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:People from Newcastle upon Tyne
title: Ben Price
